name: Sandy Shocks
flavorText: No records exist of this Pokémon being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon’s traits match up with a creature shown in an expedition journal.

previous.name: Slither Wing
previous.flavorText: This mysterious Pokémon has some similarities to a creature that an old book introduced as Slither Wing.

next.name: Iron Treads
next.flavorText: This Pokémon closely resembles a scientific weapon that a paranormal magazine claimed was sent to this planet by aliens.
